## av-scanner docs

Generates Docs

```
av-scanner docs [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --format string   Documentation format to generate. Options are: 'all', 'md', 'yaml', 'man', 'rst' (default "all")
  -h, --help            help for docs
```
